pageContext.claim: “We had a record this month, on the border. We took in and arrested more illegal's coming across -- many of these were not good people -- than we've ever done before -- ever done before.”
pageContext.analysis: Trump flips the script here. Rather than boasting the apprehensions are down, as he has in the past, he now brags that more people are being arrested. Experts say this number is not especially informative because it can be spun both ways.
